title: sharavaNabhava enak-karudi
sahitya:
sharavaNabhava enak-karudi varavE nI maravAmal iru manamE dinam Om


anupallavi

  dharaNi tanil eDutta piravi tanai aDuttu varum tollai tarum vinai taDukka Om


caraNam    karuNaik-kaDalAgat-tiruk-kATSi tandu arupaDai vIDugaLil kuDi koNDirundu 
parivuDan aDiyAraip-paripAlittiDum murugan parivODu aruL puriyavE Om
